alert.note: Alert for Polk (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 15 at 7:07AM CDT until June 17 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Des Moines IA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Iowa... South Skunk River near Ames US 30 affecting Story and Polk Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Skunk River near Ames US 30. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, The Shady Grove Trailer Park...located at 1006 South Dayton Avenue...floods. The railroad just northeast of Cambridge floods as well. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 16.7 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 22.5 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 21.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
